display_name: Women's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale: Wake earlier than planned
description:
Item from the Women's Health Initiative Insomnia Rating Scale. [Levine et al. (2003)](https://psycnet.apa.org/record/2003-06188-004)

Original question: *Pick the answer that best describes how often you experienced the situation in the past 4 weeks. 6. Did you wake up earlier than you planned to?*

[Search for all WHIIRS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=whiirs)
